thread.section_title: Pond5 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pond5 | www.pond5.com | 2 of 189
thread.title: debbie s

author: debbie s
title: debbie s
text:
I found the website extremely easy to use and well organised. the sound effects are clear even with the POND5 announcements running through them- so you aren't disappointed when you purchase them.
the main drawback to POND 5 is the price for individual sound effects. it's great value if you want to join for a year and download regularly, but for the person who only wants a handful once or twice a year, it ends up rather expensive. But would I use this website again? Most definitely, because of the range and quality.
